text: Eurycorymbus cavaleriei is a species of plant in the family Sapindaceae and the single species in the genus Eurycorymbus. It is found in China and Taiwan, where it is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== * Category:Flora of China Category:Flora of Taiwan Category:Near threatened plants Category:Monotypic Sapindaceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Sapindaceae
title: Eurycorymbus
